alert.note: Alert for Nemaha (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 19 at 5:56PM CDT until April 19 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Nemaha County in northeastern Kansas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 556 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Seneca, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Seneca, Bern, Oneida and Baileyville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for northeastern Kansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for northeastern Kansas.
